titles: Overtures offered to the Parliament in which this proposition is advanced that a small summ imposed on the nation, for reforming our standard, and for repairing the losses of the African and Indian Company, &c. bestowed in the method propos'd, will be of ten times more value to the nation in general, &c. to almost the whole individual persons in the kingdom, than the samen [sic] summ will be, if retained in each particulars hand.
author: Fletcher, Andrew, 1655-1716.
date: in the year M D CC. [1700]
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Goldsmiths' Library, University of London.
